ELF: <ref>AmigaOS up to version 3.9 could use the ELF format for PowerPC executables and libraries through ppc.library  also known as PowerUP. AmigaOS 4  uses ELF as its native executable format.</ref>

PE: <ref>The Linux kernel can recognize PE binaries through binfmt_misc and run them using Wine</ref>
<ref>The Solaris kernel can PE using Wine</ref>
